item.title: IOVA
item.description: score:-12 Chances: Iovance Biotherapeutics’ revenue is set to grow, indicating potential for increased stock value. The FDA has lifted a partial clinical hold on Iovance’s mid-stage study, showing positive regulatory progress. Risks: Iovance Biotherapeutics reported a net loss of $116.4 million in Q4, reflecting financial risk and potential impact on stock performance.
